DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety occurrence incontinence significantly decrease use propiverine hydrochloride 200 female patient mixed ( stress urge ) urinary incontinence one week twelve-week treatment period .
DOC.brief_title: Female Patients With Signs uRgE Stress Urinary Incontinence Study Propiverine Hydrochloride
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female patient mixed urinary incontinence ( MUI ) 2 . Patients symptoms urinary incontinence least 3 month 3 . Patients least one episode urge urinary incontinence per week 4 episode stress urinary incontinence per week bladder diary . 4 . 20 year old old 5 . Patients meet follow criterion ICIQSF ( 1 ) `` 23 time one week '' select Q1 . ( 2 ) `` Small '' select Q2 . ( 3 ) `` leak time cough sneeze '' `` leak time exercise '' select Q4 . 6 . Less 100mL residual urine volume 7 . Written informed consent . 1 . Patients organ disease bladder stone , bladder tumor urethral stricture lower urinary tract 2 . Patients bacterial infection ( i.e . bacterial cystitis ) nonbacterial infection ( i.e . interstitial cystitis ) 3 . Patients advance low urinary tract obstruction urinary retention 4 . Patients without urinary sensation 5 . Patients overflow incontinence 6 . Patients history complication pelvic organ prolapse 7 . Patients pyloric , duodenal intestinal obstruction 8 . Patients gastric intestinal atony 9 . Patients angleclosure glaucoma 10 . Patients myasthenia gravis 11 . Patients severe heart disease 12 . Patients severe constipation 13 . Patients dementia able complete questionnaire 14 . Patients history allergic reaction Propiverine Hydrochloride similar medicine 15 . Patients history surgery affect urination TransObturator Tape（TOT）or Tensionfree Vaginal Tape（TVT） 16 . Women pregnant , lactating , potentially pregnant willing get pregnant 17 . Patients previous surgery abdomen pelvis radiation within 6 month 18 . Patients start pelvic floor muscle exercise within 3 month 19 . Patients take Propiverine Hydrochloride similar medicine within 2 week entry 20 . Judged unsuitable trial physician .
